Package cams.database

Class UnifiedCampRepository

java.lang.Object
cams.database.UnifiedCampRepository
All Implemented Interfaces:
CampRepository
public class UnifiedCampRepository extends Object implements CampRepository
Implements CampRepository as a Singleton to manage and store Camp objects. Provides functionalities to add, retrieve, delete, and query camps.

    • getInstance

      public static UnifiedCampRepository getInstance()

    • filterCampByFaculty

      public List<Camp> filterCampByFaculty(Faculty faculty)
      Filters camps based on the specified faculty.

      This method returns a list of camps that are restricted to a given faculty, or open to all faculties if specified.

      Specified by:
      filterCampByFaculty in interface CampRepository
      Parameters:
      faculty - The faculty to filter the camps by.
      Returns:
      A list of Camp objects filtered by the specified faculty.

    • getCampID

      public String getCampID(String campName)
      Retrieves the ID of a camp based on its name.

      This method generates a unique ID for a camp by converting its name to uppercase and removing spaces.

      Parameters:
      campName - The name of the camp.
      Returns:
      The unique ID of the camp.

    • allCamps

      public List<Camp> allCamps()
      Getter method for instances of Camp stored in the repository.
      Specified by:
      allCamps in interface CampRepository
      Returns:
      List of all camp objects stored in the repository

    • isEmpty

      public boolean isEmpty()
      Checks if the hashmap storing camps in the camp repository is empty.
      Specified by:
      isEmpty in interface CampRepository
      Returns:
      true if camp is empty, else false.

    • addCamp

      public void addCamp(Camp camp)
      Adds a camp to the hashmap in the repository storing camp objects. The key is the ID of the camp, retrieved using getCampID(String)
      Specified by:
      addCamp in interface CampRepository
      Parameters:
      camp - The Camp object to add.

    • initialiseData

      public boolean initialiseData()
      Initializes the repository data from stored files.

      Loads Camp objects from serialized files in a specified directory.

      Returns:
      true if data initialization is successful, false otherwise.
